name: Sukfaristo
description:
Welcome to Sukfaristo, a game where the goal is to extract juice from charming little animals by combining them.
  • Combine two identical animals to create larger creatures.
  • Enjoy physics-based gameplay.
  • Immerse yourself in a fluid simulation with individual densities for each animal.
  • Skillfully control the fluid level to optimize your extractions.
  • Earn point multipliers based on the juice level, rewarding your risk-taking.
  • Keep your options open by putting an animal in reserve for later use.
  • Take on more intense challenges with the "grandmaster" mode.
  • Customize your experience with workshop support for community skins.
  • Showcase your skills by unlocking stimulating achievements.
